Name: 三国虎将传VR-Sanguo Warriors VR
About the game: Type This is a VR.RPG of realistic cool weapon battle experience. Operation We redesigned the game vision, operation, movement, and interactive experience based on VR features. RPG system There are various RPG classic systems such as experience, level, currency, props, weapons, and skills. There are basic games such as weapon shop, war sand table, story level, and BOSS challenge. Egg white If you read the instructions carefully, the game still has an egg barrier. Follow-up Now is the basic game demo. We are trying to create a randomly generated level and monster system, and continue to enrich the game scene, monsters, bosses, weapons, and skills.
